== Marathakkara (CT) (627852) ==

Marathakkara (CT) is a town in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 6.91 sq. km. and harbouring 3599 households with total population of 15817 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 8 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 290 km. Male population is 7852 and female population is 7965. Scheduled Caste population is 1487 and Scheduled Tribes population is 34. Census Location Code of the town is 627852<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 8 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 80 km. Railway station is at Ollur at a distance of 5 km.
